website_summaries.verdict: These shower shoes offer just what you need for the gym or pool – lots of traction and no crevices for mold to hide.
pros: Form-injected as one piece with no crevices for mildew
cons: May run small, so consider sizing up

customer_reviews.title: Second pair awful
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these sandals in aqua color last summer and love them. I ordered a second pair in black and was thrilled with them for one day. After one day, the black pair shrank! I couldn't believe it. I soaked them in warm water hoping they would regain their shape but nope, they didn't. Attached are photos comparing the two pair and also the soles showing they are the same size sandal. Just so weird.
customer_reviews.author: Gardener Girl

customer_reviews.title: Too small.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered an 8/9. They fit lit a 7/8. I needed them for work (I am a swim teacher), as my flip flops broke. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Carla M

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these! I read the reviews and ordered 1 ...
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these! I read the reviews and ordered 1 size up from my (ladies) usual 8 or 8 1/2. I got the 9-10 and they fit perfectly. I have wide feet and these are very comfortable :) The material is sturdy and flexible and feels great under my feet. Very "cushiony". I bought them to not slip at the gym in the shower and on the tile floor. Loads of traction on these when the floor is wet and while showering. Non-slip. They work great! Highly recommend. Am going to buy another pair for my husband for use at his gym.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine T.

customer_reviews.title: Order at least a size up!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to wear in the shower. My feet hurt when I stand on hard surfaces for more than a couple of minutes. These are very cushy and soft. They do run on the smaller side. I wear a pretty standard 8, so I ordered an 8-9. If I planned to wear them outside, they are way too small, but will work for my need. Also, very lightweight if you want to take to the gym or beach.
customer_reviews.author: Favorite Sister

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shower shoes
customer_reviews.text: Wearing these shoes when taking showers at the gym is essential. They are light, so it makes it really easy to just throw them in your gym bag without adding weight, but comfortable enough that you can wear them while you shower and then wear them home if you don't want to put your feet back into shoes. Better than flip flops as you don't have to make sure your toes are in the right place-just slide them on. Just dry them off and they are ready for your next trip to the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Order it one size up
customer_reviews.text: Okay, before buying. I went through a lot of reviews before deciding on which shower shoes I wanted. 1. Yes, you have to pick one size up. My feet are size 8 or 8.5 and I ordered a 9/10. It perfectly for my 8.5 feet. 2. Quality is decent, for sure not rubber. I bought these for the showers at the gym. I didn't like the thought of walking into a shower full of germs and sneaky urination. Hope this helps
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Not USA wide,.  Instead China's vesion of wide !#$@&%*
customer_reviews.text: Shoes that are alleged to be 'Wide' , which are made in China and/or Imported frm pro-Asian countries are NOT THE SAME "WIDE" AS THOSE SHOES MADE IN USA. I have purchased shoes that were made in the USA, in a width size of 'Medium' that are wider in width than those shoes that are 'Imported' !#$@&%* In my opinion if you need a 'WIDE' shoe width, don't purchase shoes that are Made in China!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Ok for after shower shoes
customer_reviews.text: I am a true US size 9 in women shoes and I ordered a size 40 and there is not an inch to spear. I could have gotten a size 41 and they may fit a little better. But I ordered them for after I come out the shower so they'll work ok. They are on the rather light and flimsy side. So don't think that if you bought them to wear them outside that they would last long at all. They're worth about $5.00-6.00 not more.
customer_reviews.author: M. Spinelli

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable slide ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased 5 pairs of these over the last 3 years and wear them everyday. I bought them in multiple colors and wear the light colors poolside so they don’t get hot in the sun, and wear the black when I’m out and about. Super comfortable- like you’re walking on a squishy cushion and they stay that way. The only problem I have is that my dog loves to chew them- but at this price...who cares! I just buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Best. Shoes. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes so much i own FIVE pair - and dont own a pool! I wear them everywhere. They are light weight and comfortable but extremely sturdy and do not wear down like many other pair of summer shoes I’ve owned (including expensive Nike and Teva). I even wear them instead of slippers. Extremely versatile foot wear that easily transition from house shoes to futzing around town. Truly comfortable right out of the bag. Best part, when they get dirty, I throw them right in the washer and bleach them with my whites (every color I own) and they come out looking brand new. Amazingly durable, remarkably wearable. These shoes are indestructible.
customer_reviews.author: lucybusmc

customer_reviews.title: Functional aqua slippers - great for sauna & steam
customer_reviews.text: I love these super cheap and easy women's shower slippers. Recently joined our fabulous new YMCA and I've been using the steam room and showers and sauna and to keep up with top hygiene, I like to wear slippers in the shower. First of all, I love this lovely happy aqua color. I've worn these now about 10 times and even though it is NOT - I repeat it's NOT - high quality plastic at all, it is firm and durable and it's doing the job I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Farnoosh Brock

customer_reviews.title: Size matters
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed, I used the size chart to assure I was going to receive a US women's size 8/9, which on the sandal is a size 39. (Check the size chart, I'm not making this up.) The sandals arrived, I was happy because they're for my daughter. And they're more like a size 6 in womens. If buying these sandals, I would recommend buying 2 sizes larger than your normal size. You might be able to get a pair that fits you then.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Nice slides for traveling.
customer_reviews.text: somewhat wide, and not all that much arch support, but actually compared to most flip flops and inexpensive slides, these are better than I expected. I as a rule do not wear these type of shoes. These were bought for travel, and they are nice and lightweight and can take getting wet. That was the purpose of them, and I think they will fulfill that purpose quite nicely. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: msartiste4

customer_reviews.title: No support and product was used then sent to me
customer_reviews.text: No arch support, product was someone else’s return. They had dirty feet when they tried it on and the soles had grass and dirt on them. The bottoms were browned from whatever surface they were worn on. Totally gross and nasty.
customer_reviews.author: AnnieM

customer_reviews.title: Black sandals don't fit same as pink
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the black sandals and though both pairs I ordered are marked size 36, the left and right shoe of each pair I ordered are not the same size!!! I would most definitely NOT recommend these, I loved the pink ones I ordered initially, maybe the seller I bought the black pairs from sold defective shoes, but I wouldn't order these any more, the shoes are unusable for even a quick trip from the car to poolside.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy R.

customer_reviews.title: fits more like an 8
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these several years ago. They were a bit small for a 10 but I assumed they would stretch a bit and they did. However, this pair, though marked as a 10, fits more like an 8. I will give them away and not buy any more. It's my experience with items made in China and other similar countries that they don't have a real 10. Some are honest about this, but others apparently simply mark smaller items as a ten and send them on their way to our country. The shoe itself is ok but doesn't do me any good, thus the one star.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Payne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pool Shoe and/or Slipper
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes to wear at the pool, to protect my feet in the locker room, the showers, and on the concrete. The traction is great, no slipping around on locker room tiles. I wear them in the shower and they dry out very quickly at home. I wear an 8 1/2 W shoe. The 9/10 fits really well. They're very comfortable, too. BTW, I have a REALLY hard time finding shoes or slippers that are comfortable on me because I have arthritis in my feet. My 20 something daughter likes them so much, she bought a pair to use as slippers. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: CrazyDaisy

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Price, Comfy Too!
customer_reviews.text: Great just what I've been looking,looking & looking for.......Not too soft/spongy. But not hard plastic like the ones I bought these to replace. Great garden shoes rinse & dry fast. Black color perfect & very comfy too! The price was fantastic searched many slides of this type on Amazon & even the exact shoe with different name on them were at least double the $6.99 these cost me! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ruthie W

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Liked these so much I ordered 4 more pair! However, if your shoe size is at the higher level of the size (e.g. you're a 6 not a 5) order the next size up if you want a roomier fit. Otherwise, the 5/6 did fit my size 6 foot. I now own 14 pairs and I still LOVE them. Never had a chemical odor. They are vacuum formed and 1 out of the 14 had some machining deformities- Amazon made it right after I called them!
customer_reviews.author: Bling700

customer_reviews.title: Made of something extra cheap
customer_reviews.text: Opened the package. Look at the picture. You couldn't see it's broken till it's on your feet. I liked how they looked, went through reviews and ordered. It's the third time I get my order partially destroyed. Ordering from abroad takes effort an d it's really disappointing when something leaks or gets torn in a moment or comes broken. Hope this review will be posted. Because another one of another item was not.
customer_reviews.author: Maria L.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit right and terribly uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I tried these on and immediately sat down and request that I return these shower slide-on sandals. I normally wear a 7.5, in my horseback riding boots (the only time I wear) an 8. So, I order a 7-8. When I was standing, they seemed to fit. As soon as I took one step, my heel slipped backwards and completely out of the sandal...they obviously didn't fit me right. Regardless of that, when standing, they were SUPER UNCOMFORTABLE! Hard as a rock and I couldn't imagine wearing these for 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: OTTB05

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in my regular size, but it was at least a half-size too small. Seemed like an okay shoe otherwise. Would have served well for my intended use as a shower shoe at the gym. I found another shoe I liked better so I didn't bother exchanging for a bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: TurtleKat

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use for camping and showering in the clubhouse. They were so comfortable and light that I bought two additional pairs to use at the fitness center and their pool/shower. Excellent product - gave one pair to family member for the same use and they rave about it too!
customer_reviews.author: rondda l reid

customer_reviews.title: Way too small
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are much much smaller than advertised. I wanted to return them but the shipping costs are the same as the actual shoes so what's the point. Very very disappointed in these. I will not be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Gillian

customer_reviews.title: CAUTION! Yellow sandals do show the dirt.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. The fit was snug but comfortable. I was happy and ready to wear them out to the hot tub when Isaw all the grease marks on the LEFT sandal. The RIGHT on was brand new and clean as a whistle. The left was filthy and covered with marks that did not come off with a soft cloth or soap and water. Bummer!! They went right back. Since I love bright yellow slip-on's I am reluctant to order again.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Fay

customer_reviews.title: Sizing Is Way Off
customer_reviews.text: just received these last night and sad to say they will be returned. Way Too Small. I didn't even think to read the reviews. It says women's US sizes. Now that I have read some of the reviews turns out this is a big problem. I wear an 8 1/2 - 9 shoe depending on style on this shoe my heal was at least 1/2 inch over the back. It felt more like a 7.
customer_reviews.author: D. L. L.

customer_reviews.title: Size Up
customer_reviews.text: I read the Reviews and offered a size Up These are very cute, but the band that goes cross the top was too highsd did not touch my foot Plus the length was too short. If you have chubby, short feet....these are perfect. OTOH, if you have flatter feet and long toes, I'm not sure any size adjustment would work
customer_reviews.author: jumptherope

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: they do not slip on the slick shower floor. I love these. I tried the mats but they just got dirty looking. and some hard to walk on with all those suction cups underneath. Took up the mat and using these now and they are perfect. I could even wear them out as they are so comfy. I usually wear an 8 1/2 or 9 in an open toe. Got the 9/10 and fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie N.

customer_reviews.title: The yellow is so bright and cheerful - walking on sunshine - great inexpensive shoe
customer_reviews.text: Sized up one size, normally wear a size 7.5 which is the equivalent to a number 39. The yellow is so bright and cheerful - walking on sunshine - great inexpensive shoe, sizing is tricky or would give them 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: 2guzgrl

customer_reviews.title: love them :)
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shoe for outdoors at the lake.. but it did run small. It will not stop me from wearing them. I wear a 9 and that's what I ordered. There is no room at all so if you wear anything bigger than a 9 you might want to size up. OK so I went camping this weekend.. Let me say .. I LOVE THEM! they are my favorite camping shoes now.. I plan to buy more in different colors.. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Krista Treaster

customer_reviews.title: Works good in Showers.
customer_reviews.text: I use these for the shower at the gym. Lightweight, I never feel like I'm going to slip in them, and they stay on my feet good. The little nubs inside I thought would annoy me, but they actually feel pretty good. The only issue I had with them is water somewhat pools inside the sandal, but it's minor. I've even worn these to the store and around because they look good to scuff around in.
customer_reviews.author: daocmom

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are perfect for use in the shower or at the beach. They are so comfy, I wear them all day around the house. I find that they are the best slipper to keep in my suit case for travel as they are lightweight and easy to pack. In fact, I bought an extra pair for just this reason. Great product. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for the price
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has worn them all summer as a lifeguard at a water park. That means constantly on her feet 'roaming' & wet from walking in the shallows. These shoes held up & don't smell at all. My son bought under armor slides to be cool & his smell awful no matter how much Lysol we spray on them or sunshine they sit in. These slides are worth every penny. But do size up. She is a solid 9 & the 9/10 just fit her.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: They were very comfortable. Only minor negative I had was that the inside sole (where your foot goes), is a little slick/shiny. Haven’t tried them with wet feet, but I am guessing foot might slip within the shoe a little bit, when feet are wet.
customer_reviews.author: Don't want to use a name

customer_reviews.title: slippery
customer_reviews.text: Bottom (where your feet go) is 'slippery' so it's difficult to walk (have to 'grip' hard with toes). Needs some sort of grip where the bottom of your feet go. I haven't worn them but once because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Ann Moyer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: These do tend to run a bit small. I'm an 8-8.5, and I'm glad I got the 8-9 because my toes and heel are at the ends of this shoe. If I were a 9, I'd probably order a size up. Great for slip resistance. May not be good if you have wide or "tall" feet as these aren't super roomy, but that's a good thing to help with slip resistance. They are super lightweight. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Prevent slips on wet surfaces!
customer_reviews.text: I am currently having trouble with the cold, flat tile of the shower - it creates pain right up my leg bones. These slides don't slip and provide the cushion I need to protect my feet/legs from the cold. I tried a pair of flip flops - very surprised when they slipped as I got out of the shower. So the slides do just as I had hoped. Great product/low price!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny B10

customer_reviews.title: These feel amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these with low expectations to use around the house and I’m extremely impressed. They feel absolutely amazing and I don’t want to take them off. Almost like I’m getting a foot massage every time I slide them on.
customer_reviews.author: Div

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Soft
customer_reviews.text: These slide-on sandals are incredibly comfortable and soft. They are just every so slightly smaller than the stated size but fit well enough for shower shoes at the gym. Be careful when removing the plastic tie and tag. I accidentally pulled on it and it ripped right through where it was connected. I'd buy another pair of these to have for the beach.
customer_reviews.author: MMC07

customer_reviews.title: Run a little bit small
customer_reviews.text: I just like to keep a pair of slip on shoes next to the door so I can go outside in the yard (I'm usually in just sox in the house). They work well for that, but they are a little small. I wear a 6.5, and I got the 6/7 size. They would be too small if they weren't open toes. I would say the 6/7 is actually a 6.
customer_reviews.author: CYJ

customer_reviews.title: Decent Swim/Shower Slide
customer_reviews.text: Size 40 (Ladies 9/10) fits more like a solid 9. The logo was smudged badly on one of the slides. I'm only wearing them in the gym shower, so neither complaint is a big deal. For the price (and for the availability in the middle of winter), I can't complain too much.
customer_reviews.author: u/IDoMindTheDudeMinds

customer_reviews.title: Runs small.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 37 and fits like 35. Overall quality is good. I have to a friend who is size 35 and fits her perfectly, not an ounce larger. A good shower slippers.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Vouloumanos

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: These run super small I ordered a size bigger and they were still small. I love the shoe though. I gave it to my friend with small feet.
customer_reviews.author: Krissy Ott

customer_reviews.title: These are great.  Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I'd like some other color options, but beyond that, no complaints! Very soft on the feet, supportive and very comfortable. A little bit of rubbing where big too meets the main part of foot, but nothing a small band aide can't cure. And that's probably because of how my feet are shaped. Anytime you wear foot gear without socks you can run into this sort of thing. But it's really no big deal at all. Sometimes I wear a pair of slippers inside of the sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Erhard

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: had a foot medical procedure done and these are one and only things I could wear without pain and pressure on the wound. I bought a second pair in pink. OK, I know they are not a shoe, but they worked for me and I love them.
customer_reviews.author: pugluvr60

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and functional
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable shoes. I I bought them for the shower at the gym but by myself wearing them other times as well. They did not have a smell and I am very very sensitive to scent.
customer_reviews.author: AmyWenDreams

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality - No Slipping on Wet Floors!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best shoes! They are comfortable to walk in, lightweight and slip proof on the wet pool tile and shower stall! I am very happy with this purchase. I usually were a 6.5 shoe and a size 6 sandal. I ordered the size 5/6 and they are not too small! So - don't feel you need to order a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Diamond in the Rough

customer_reviews.title: I love everything about these sandals
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these sandals. I originally bought a pair for a cruise I went on.Since then, I have purchased two more pairs.I wear them to work, as slippers, to garden in and any other reason I can come up with. They are super comfortable. There are many shoes I just can’t wear these days but these are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie_q49

customer_reviews.title: Feel Great on your feet
customer_reviews.text: I was actually surprised at the comfort and fit. They are very light and they massage your feet gently. I would am ordering several more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really cute but too small
customer_reviews.text: Loved them but they ran a little small, I got them and packed them for my vacation without trying then on. By the time I realized they were too small was too late to exchange so I gave them to my sister ~~ will order a size up soon as they were really cute and my sister says they're really comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For the price, I couldn't ask for better
customer_reviews.text: I use these as shower and pool shoes at the gym. They fit me perfectly, and feel very comfortable on my feet. The bottom is very nice as it has just enough grip to make it not slippery. For $5 you really cannot go wrong!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sparkler

customer_reviews.title: very comfy
customer_reviews.text: I loved the fit of these; however, I had to return them because they did not have a size 41! I was so disappointed! If you have wide feet though these may not work for you because there wasn't much wiggle room for my foot, which I like but may not work for some people!
customer_reviews.author: Juliette Malchow

customer_reviews.title: Good weatherproff slides
customer_reviews.text: I like to leave this pair by my back door to change to when I do yard work. My regular shoes always, always gets mud on the bottom. So now I don't have to keep cleaning them.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Kay

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, but adequate. Slightly narrow.
customer_reviews.text: Great deal. These are slightly narrow but otherwise fit my 7.5 size foot. They do give me blisters. If you intend to take these on a beach vacation, don’t! They are good for the gym shower & use at public pools. They drain fine & don’t keep my feet wet.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: I love these sandals and the comfort they provide.
customer_reviews.text: The sandals are attractive, durable, and comfortable even on bad feet. They are very reasonably priced. I have a pair in every color and a couple in black. I live in FL and wear them outside--to the store, the movies, visiting friends. They can handle outdoor walking.
customer_reviews.author: Tallygal

customer_reviews.title: NOT TRUE TO SIZE
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size larger than I normally wear. Got these and they were too small and nowhere near wide enough. I gave them to a person with a really narrow foot. These are not true to size. Beware.
customer_reviews.author: greenwave 64

customer_reviews.title: Durable and great for the gym
customer_reviews.text: They are non-slip in the shower and easy to slip on and off. They run small. The largest size fits my 9.5 foot snuggly. I have wide feet and it is a decent fit but they do run a bit small.
customer_reviews.author: Cook in Belleville

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable. Wear them all day long. Eases back pain. I wont be without a new pair waiting. 5 star
customer_reviews.author: Doris E

customer_reviews.title: My college student loves these!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my daughter who was going to college! She wanted slippers that she could wear in the shower that were cute and of course none slip. I took a chance ordering these for her and to my surprise she love them! She told me she wears them all the time sometimes even in her room just to walk around in! I am so happy with this purchase and I am glad that this is also college student approved!
customer_reviews.author: Pder

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered size 7. They are Way too small. I have ordered Vertigo before and they fit great. Not these.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These run a bit small so it will tear at the toe if your feet are too big; otherwise it had a good grip and are very comfortable. Great for poolside or shower shoes at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: E. Lo

customer_reviews.title: Giving it 3 start because they're comfortable, but
customer_reviews.text: Giving it 3 start because they're comfortable, but... I hate the fact that the sizing is incorrect on all these, you can purchase 3 of same size and they all have different lengths. You have to get lucky.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Great  slide sandal
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I use them to slip into to take the dogs out at night. Feel good and are lightweight. So easy to wear. My only complaint is that it took a little longer than expected to receive them but he sandal itself is great.
customer_reviews.author: F A Davis

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have ordered a size up. I ripped the tag off, and it ripped the sandal. Been wearing them to the pool for over a year without any further damage.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and safe!
customer_reviews.text: I use these to walk to the pool in my condo complex that is full of cacti. They keep my feet safe! And they are not slippery when my feet are wet, and protect my feet from the hot pool deck in the summer. Easy on and off. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I gave these to my daughter . she loved them . Her dog ate one of them so you know they were good.
customer_reviews.author: Lynnet

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality product. Long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: I use this in the shower and as a house slippers. It's easy to clean and dry with a towel after showering. Long lasting rubber material, durable, nice pink color, good design, and easy to wear. I will purchase this product again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: ExoticAromas

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have for showering in public areas.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with these. Got them to wear in the shower at the club. They are lightweight to put in my gym bag, were inexpensive and are very comfortable for my foot. SO glad I got these. I love the bright banana yellow too. Make my feet happy.
customer_reviews.author: srh

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic and a great deal!
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are fantastic. I know they're listed as shower and poolside, but I wear them around my house all day. They're so comfortable, feels like I'm walking on air. They look cute and not cheap looking at all. What a great deal. I'm very impressed with these sandals. I really recommend these sandals to anyone who is looking for comfy sandal that you can shower in, these are for you!
customer_reviews.author: Jan Monte

customer_reviews.title: love these shower / gym sandals
customer_reviews.text: love these shower / gym sandals... i bought these for the shower at the gym and they are perfect. in fact they are so comfortable i wear them around our condo also. They are pretty, light, dry very fast and fit the bill. Rather than the far costlier brand name shoe/sandals that fall apart after 2 years these will last a long time....plus, i do not need to spend lots of effort drying them out. they dry fast, on their own. HIghly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: olive v

customer_reviews.title: Vertico womens - somewhat small. - order next size up at least.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my wife. She wears an 8 wide or 8.5 med shoe. I first purchased the 8-9. She said they were too narrow and a little small. I sent them back and ordered the 9-10. She likes the 9-10, although they are not big at all. If there was a size larger than the 9-10 I would have ordered those but the 9-10 will work. Order at least a size up.
customer_reviews.author: R. Rob.

customer_reviews.title: These perform well.
customer_reviews.text: For about the $12 I paid they have performed as expected. No slip on wet floors at the gym pool and locker room. They have lasted fairly well with use four times a week to they gym pool. They are comfortable and are very walkable.
customer_reviews.author: Citygirl

customer_reviews.title: Makes funny noises!
customer_reviews.text: They fit great, and the color is exact! The only issue I had was I bought them to keep my feet dry, so I would dry my feet off before putting them in the sandal, but then condensation would make them slippery even if the room was not very hot, which can be a hassle and makes funny noises. They work, though, so I am going to keep them!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: they're actually kinda cute.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as slippers to wear around the house and they're so comfortable that I almost left the house wearing them on one occasion. I bought the pink to be funny because I thought they'd be loudly garish, but they're actually kinda cute. I definitely recommend them for the price.
customer_reviews.author: idreamstarr

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable sandals
customer_reviews.text: Eve though it fits snugs, it is a comfortable enough pair of sandals to wear at home. Wear them instead of house slippers.
customer_reviews.author: Norma S Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Soft for extended use and comfortable non tiring
customer_reviews.text: Personal use. Love them. Travel 2 days after I recieved them and still comfortable. Color teal and accurate to pic. Would order other colors if avaikable. My new daily wear. Love them
customer_reviews.author: lisa c. pardue

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for hostel showers, backpacking, going to the beach, and water crossings on the AT! These are durable, lightweight, dry super quick, and are fairly slide resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Finley Wynters

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for my feet
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable flip-flops ever! Light, comfy, easy to wash, easy to dry, these are fantastic! Excellent! I wear 5, got a 6, and they feel like a 5 1/2 -- which is fine because I wanted them comfy on my feet. I fell in love with them.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for after -shower shoes. Clearly they would work for wearing in the shower as well. I just wanted something to put on so that I could keep my slippers dry. These are exactly what I needed. They're also extremely comfortable so they will get lots and lots of use
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Lithander

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, cute, and didn't mess up my feet like flip flops!
customer_reviews.text: These are really comfortable and cute. I recently threw away my flip flops because I really hurt my feet by wearing them too much, and after switching to these for home and Crocs for work, I am feeling much better. I'm definitely going to buy a few more pairs.
customer_reviews.author: NorthAtlanticIslander

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Besides being to small! The were hard to wear. Like standing on concrete. 👍👍 Will not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kimsluck33

customer_reviews.title: RUNS SMALL.
customer_reviews.text: These run small. I wear a size 9 and would have ordered a size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi K

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 8 and have slightly narrow feet. The 39 fit like a dream! The shower sandal stays put on my feet and does not slide around. They are also very cushiony and dry quickly. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: mustang

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Shower or Pool Slide
customer_reviews.text: Perfect slide for showers at the pool or campground. Lightweight, cushioned & waterproof. I usually wear an 8.5 but based on other reviews I ordered down a half size. I have a wider foot with shorter toes, so the size 8 works well for me. They are a little snug in the toe box but they do stretch with wear. If you have longer toes, you might want to stick with your originally size.
customer_reviews.author: Dee A. Marfe

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Keep these at the back door to slip on walking around in the yard etc. I have worn them out a few times. Great value
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Massaging Bumps
customer_reviews.text: My mother raved about these shoes (she has two pairs). She keeps one pair in the shower, and the other in her bedroom. So I got a pair for myself, and they are very light, and I like the soft "bumps" massaging the soles of my feet (unlike the massaging hard spots on Crocs which can irritate sensitive skin).
customer_reviews.author: Moonrisings

customer_reviews.title: So comfy
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 35 (European, 5ish American) and these fit me perfectly despite being size 36 (6ish). I bought them just to be shower shoes, but they're so comfortable, I might just get another pair to wear around the house!
customer_reviews.author: Amy B.

customer_reviews.title: Get Them!!
customer_reviews.text: These "shower shoes" fit perfectly and are very lightweight and comfortable. I also wear them indoors as sandals. I like them so well that I ordered another pair in a different color. Thanks Much!
customer_reviews.author: Shop Girl

customer_reviews.title: Fit and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes because they are so comfortable . I have the ones I have been wearing for over a year and still awesome that is why I purchased another.
customer_reviews.author: Donna L.

customer_reviews.title: Love these sandals!
customer_reviews.text: Love these sandals! Was looking for something to wear around the pool that wouldn't slip or get ruined when wet. These sandals are perfect, and they are super comfortable, too. I wear them around the house as well.
customer_reviews.author: kkalico

customer_reviews.title: It fits small.
customer_reviews.text: It fits very small. buy a larger size if you want to buy a just a cheap casual sandal
customer_reviews.author: Sengul

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Gym Shower Stalls
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about the sizing and wanted to make sure that I received a pair that I could wear and not have to return. I wear a size 8 1/2 medium. I ordered a size 9/10 which fits perfectly. The packaging states that the odor will resolve by I believe the 2nd day of wearing and it did. So I was pleased with that because I am sensitive to strong odors. I am wearing these in the shower and they work great for this purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia H.

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I can't stand to go barefoot. I bought these when I wore out yet another pair of flipflops. These are light, comfortable, non-slip, cute, easy to wash, and I can wear socks with them. They seem very durable, and I expect them to last longer than flipflops.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The description says the size is a 9/10. I wear a 10 shoe and my toes and heels hang over the ends. I'm keeping them only because they'll be worn to the pool only. If you wear a size 10 and want to use these for a lot of walking, think again.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: They are fine if your feet are dry
customer_reviews.text: They are fine if your feet are dry.When wet you slither around in them,don't try and walk good chance of falling. I take a size 6, and were wide on me. I bought pale blue they look nice ,They are made in one piece of plastic .The nobbly inner sole is not noticeable when they are on.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shower slip-on shoes
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with these shower slippers. I think they are priced too high. Worth maybe half the price. But they feel good on, not slippery on wet tile, really nice color and light weight. My foot is 7.5. I wear size 8 shoes and ordered the size 8/9. Fits perfectly. Bought second pair to keep in travel bag.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma J.

customer_reviews.title: These sandals are very cheaply made and the bottoms were dirty when I received it
customer_reviews.text: I just needed sandals to put on my feet when I get out the shower. These sandals are very cheaply made and the bottoms were dirty when I received it. When I first put them on to wear the sandals were crushing my baby toes but after awhile I guess the sandals stretched out a bit because I stopped having that problem. Anyways in this case you get what you paid for cheap for cheap.
customer_reviews.author: glam

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what was needed!
customer_reviews.text: This slide sandal is exactly what was needed for an elderly sister...light weight, easy to put on & can be worn with or without socks!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Advertised Size - WAY too small!  Good design for pool and shower though...
customer_reviews.text: 1 star for the posted sizes - I wear a size 9.5M Women's US - I ordered a 9/10 size "40" and it felt like a size 8M - too short to work. I would have ordered next largest size however - it's not available =(. The design is very nice for pool and shower - 4 stars on design.
customer_reviews.author: Regina M Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Great color and fit. I use these at the gym sauna and other relaxation areas where I want to protect my feet from fungus, et al.
customer_reviews.author: tabby

product_meta.title: Vertico - Women's V-Spa Shower Sandal | Comfortable and Waterproof Slide On Sandal
feature_bullets: Great for Community Showers and Pools
Helps Prevent Transfer of Foot Fungus, Athlete's Foot and Worms from Shower Floors
Form Injected as One Piece with No Mildew Dwelling Crevices
